recipes.title: Hearty Veggie Stir-Fry

creator.name: NewTek Kitchen
creator.ingredients:
1 tbsp olive oil
1 bell pepper, sliced
1 cup broccoli florets
1 carrot, julienned
1 cup snap peas
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 tbsp soy sauce
1 tsp sesame oil
Cooked rice or noodles (to serve)

recipes.description: A quick and colorful vegetable stir-fry packed with fresh veggies and simple Asian-inspired flavors.
recipes.instructions:
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds.
Add bell pepper, broccoli, carrot, and snap peas.
Stir-fry vegetables for 5–7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, stir to coat.
Serve immediately over cooked rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Classic Breakfast Scramble

creator.name: Veneer Kitchen
creator.ingredients:
3 eggs
1 tbsp butter
¼ cup diced onion
¼ cup diced bell pepper
Salt and pepper to taste
Optional: shredded cheese or fresh herbs

recipes.description: A simple, comforting breakfast scramble that’s quick to make and easy to customize.
recipes.instructions:
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Add onion and bell pepper and sauté until soft.
Beat the eggs in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Pour eggs into the skillet and stir continuously until cooked.
Add cheese or herbs if desired.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato Pasta

creator.name: Dolor Cloud Kitchen
creator.ingredients:
250g pasta (penne or spaghetti)
1 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 cup crushed tomatoes
½ cup heavy cream
Salt and pepper to taste
Grated parmesan (optional)

recipes.description: A rich yet simple pasta dish combining tangy tomatoes with a smooth, creamy sauce.
recipes.instructions:
Cook pasta according to package instructions and drain.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and season with salt and pepper.
Add cooked pasta and toss to coat.
Serve with grated parmesan if desired.

recipes.title: Fresh Chicken Wraps

creator.name: Alpha Elite Eats
creator.ingredients:
2 cooked chicken breasts, sliced
4 tortilla wraps
Lettuce, shredded
Tomato, sliced
¼ cup mayonnaise or yogurt sauce
Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.description: Light and satisfying chicken wraps filled with fresh vegetables and a creamy sauce.
recipes.instructions:
Lay out the tortilla wraps.
Spread mayonnaise or yogurt sauce evenly on each wrap.
Place lettuce, tomato slices, and chicken on the wraps.
Season with salt and pepper.
Roll up the wraps tightly.
Cut in half and serve.

recipes.title: Loaded Beef Chili

creator.name: Browning Technologies Kitchen
creator.ingredients:
1 lb ground beef
1 can kidney beans, drained
1 can diced tomatoes
1 small onion, diced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tbsp chili powder
Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.description: A hearty, comforting beef chili that’s rich, filling, and perfect for cooler days.
recipes.instructions:
Cook ground beef in a large pot over medium heat until browned.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Stir in diced tomatoes, kidney beans, and chili powder.
Simmer on low heat for 30–40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot, optionally with shredded cheese or sour cream.

recipes.title: Baked Lemon Salmon

creator.name: Port Solutions Kitchen
creator.ingredients:
2 salmon fillets
1 lemon, sliced
1 tbsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
Fresh dill or parsley (optional)

recipes.description: A light and flavorful salmon dish with fresh lemon and herbs, baked to perfection.
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Drizzle olive oil over salmon and season with salt and pepper.
Top with lemon slices and fresh herbs if desired.
Bake for 12–15 minutes until salmon is cooked through.
Serve immediately.
